backend/main.mo: Actor module managing products, categories, users, digital purchases, and Stripe config with authorization and blob storage mixins. Provides CRUD operations and helper queries for the storefront backend.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing related frontend files, components, and tests for verifying the end‑to‑end Add New Product flow works reliably.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of key frontend components, pages, hooks, and styling configuration.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining light and dark theme CSS variables and applying base background, text, and border styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entrypoint setting metadata, favicons, and loading the React application via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app wiring routes, layout, theme provider, identity state, profile setup modal, and Stripe setup modal.
frontend/src/components/admin/ProductDig: Dialog for uploading, replacing, or removing a product’s digital download file with progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/DemoDataSeeder.t: Admin‑only utility component that seeds demo categories, products, hero banner, and brand story content if missing.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Responsive footer showing brand info, navigation links, static categories list, and social media icons.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Renders the main site header with navigation, authentication handling, and admin/user‑specific links using Internet Identity and React Router.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal prompting new users to enter and save their name via a profile‑creation mutation.
frontend/src/components/StripeSetupModal: Admin‑only modal for configuring Stripe by submitting secret keys and allowed countries when Stripe is not yet set up.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, logout, and persisted identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query wrappers for backend operations including user profiles, admin checks, homepage content, products, and digital downloads.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base file defining light and dark theme OKLCH color variables plus custom utility classes for premium UI styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point that initializes React, sets up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with hero, story, and values sections using cards, icons, and an image.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Admin dashboard allowing authenticated admins to manage hero banners, brand story, products, categories, and digital downloads.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Contact page with contact info cards and a form that simulates submission and displays toast notifications.
frontend/src/pages/DownloadsPage.tsx: Downloads page showing a user's purchased digital products, with login checks and loading states.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the homepage with a hero banner, featured products, and skeleton loading states using fetched CMS content.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailurePage.ts: Displays a payment failure message with common issues and navigation options back to the shop or support.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccessPage.ts: Processes successful purchases, records digital product downloads, and shows download links or a processing state.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailPage.tsx: Shows product details with images and purchase flow, handling loading states and checkout session creation.
frontend/src/pages/ShopPage.tsx: Lists products with search and category filtering, displaying loading skeletons while fetching data.
frontend/src/utils/productImage.ts: Safely returns the primary product image URL with error handling.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, content paths, extended color palette using OKLCH variables, custom animations, shadows, and layout settings. Imports typography, container queries, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Defines project state, including schema version, goals, known issues, and a list of existing feature requirements for building a digital worksheet storefront.
